OwnerUser.AboutMe: Entrepreneur and Pinax Lead Developer; Web Standards and Open Source Guy; Movie Producer and Digital Cinematographer; Composer and Music Theorist; Greek Scholar and Doctoral Student in Linguistics

Body:
In the context of historical linguistics, it means the word is just a hypothetical reconstruction, not an actually attested word.

(The asterisk has another meaning which is to mark an ungrammatical utterance)
